name: World of PADMAN
author: bas1874@github.com
description: World of PADMAN (WoP) standalone server. with automatic configuration generation.

startup_commands.Default: ./wopded +set fs_homepath . +set fs_basepath . +set fs_game {{FS_GAME}} +set dedicated {{DEDICATED_TYPE}} +set net_port {{SERVER_PORT}} +set com_hunkMegs {{MAX_RAM}} +exec {{SERVER_CONFIG}}

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# World of PADMAN Installation Script

apt -y update
apt -y install curl jq unzip wget

cd /mnt/server

# 1. Download Game Files
if [ "${VERSION}" == "latest" ]; then
    DOWNLOAD_URL=$(curl -s https://api.github.com/repos/PadWorld-Entertainment/worldofpadman/releases/latest | jq -r '.assets[] | select(.name | contains("unified.zip")) | .browser_download_url')
else
    CLEAN_VERSION="${VERSION#v}"
    DOWNLOAD_URL="https://github.com/PadWorld-Entertainment/worldofpadman/releases/download/v${CLEAN_VERSION}/wop-${CLEAN_VERSION}-unified.zip"
fi

echo "Downloading from ${DOWNLOAD_URL}..."
curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_URL} -o wop.zip

echo "Extracting files..."
unzip -q -o wop.zip
rm wop.zip

# 2. Permissions & Architecture Symlink
echo "Setting up executables..."
chmod +x wopded.*

ARCH=$(uname -m)
if [ "$ARCH" == "aarch64" ] || [ "$ARCH" == "arm64" ]; then
    ln -sf wopded.aarch64 wopded
elif [ "$ARCH" == "x86_64" ] || [ "$ARCH" == "amd64" ]; then
    ln -sf wopded.x86_64 wopded
else
    ln -sf wopded.x86 wopded
fi

# 3. Generate Config
mkdir -p ${FS_GAME}

echo "Generating ${FS_GAME}/${SERVER_CONFIG}..."
cat << EOF > ${FS_GAME}/${SERVER_CONFIG}
//
//    World of PADMAN - Panel generated server settings
//

// Server name and message
set sv_hostName "${SERVER_HOSTNAME}"
set g_MOTD      "Welcome to World of PADMAN!"

// Server settings
set sv_maxClients "12"
set sv_VoIP       "1"
set sv_maxRate    "9000"

// Download Settings
set sv_allowdownload "${ALLOW_DOWNLOAD}"

// Bot settings
set bot_enable     "1"
set bot_minPlayers "4"
set g_spSkill      "2"

// Passwords
set rconPassword "${RCON_PASSWORD}"
set g_password   ""

// Game settings
set g_allowVote "1"
set g_doWarmup  "1"
set g_warmup    "30"

// Execution of map rotation
exec "rotation.cfg"

// Fallback map just in case rotation fails
map wop_padgarden
EOF

echo "Installation complete!"

variables.name: Allow Downloads
variables.description: 1 = Allow players to download maps from the server. 0 = Disable.

variables.name: Config File Name
variables.description: The name of the config file inside the fs_game folder.

variables.name: Game Version

variables.name: Mod Folder (fs_game)
variables.description: The folder name for the game data. Default is 'wop'.

variables.name: RCON Password
variables.description: Password for remote admin. Leave empty to disable RCON.

variables.name: Server Hostname
variables.description: The name of the server displayed in the browser.
